title: Patch 6.17
body:
So patch 6.17 updated
finding match
i found a match
locked a champ
loading screen is black screen for like 10 mins or 5 mins or so 
i reconnected 5 times or more 
last time reconnected i found my self in the post-game board with a LeaverBuster infront of my face saying that i have 5 matches to make,20 minutes each.



luv you rito <333
#sphagetticoding

**Best game**

replies.body: A black loading screen usually indicates an issue with your network failing to connect to the game server.  If this is still happening, I suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help resolve this.  The leaverbuster penalty would only happen after multiple games and not one infraction, so it's important to get this fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions!

I'm getting a leaverbuster because I indeed tried to go in different game modes several time. So this is not one occasion. I don't think you really get my issue. I am connected to the game, so there are no connection problems. The only struggle is, there is a black screen in front of it. If I Alt tab and go back to the game, I can see myself in the base for like 200 ms, and I'm even capable to move if I'm fast enough.
